name: reimportation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of bringing something back into a country after it has been sent to another country; something that is brought back in this way: The government banned reimportation of exported medicines. Reimportation is only allowed if a certificate was obtained at the time of export. This new set of restrictions will minimize the risk of re-importations. These reimportations may be referred to as goods returned. Related word
reimport
More examplesFewer examplesBoth of the senators support legalizing the reimportation of drugs to the United States from Canada.The oil is exported for processing before its re-importation.They are going to introduce a bill that will allow the reimportation of prescription drugs.
